item.title: Mac-Grove equity and inclusivity task force
item.description: I’ve worked for MGCC for about a year and a half. Recently, I’ve moved from general event support to helping research, plan, and implement our neighborhood-wide and city council approved equity plan.

item.title: URBAN GIS: NORTHSIDE ACHIEVEMENT ZONE
item.description: In the spring of 2017 I took an Urban GIS course that partnered with the Northside Achievement Zone (NAZ). I worked in the Housing Stability group and focused on gentrification susceptibility, evictions, and shifting homeownership patterns.

item.title: @ me next time: a sentiment analysis of tweets at Twin Cities mayors
item.description: In my data science final project, I worked in a group that looked at perceptions of Minneapolis mayor Jacob Frey and St. Paul Mayor Melvin Carter on twitter and in the comments section of the local newspaper.

item.title: North Nashville neighborhood change reference map
Spotify playlists I made throughout study abroad
item.description: Music from my time in Cape Town, Ahmedabad, and Sao Paulo My study abroad program in the fall of my Junior year focused on global cities in the 21st century. We usually worked and studied at a local university or community center and had to commute to and from our home stays every morning. I made a playlist for each of the three cities we stayed in - Sao Paulo, Cape Town, and Ahmedabad.

item.title: Name of the work 8
item.description: I’m a quantitative lead in a large-scale study of the causes and implications of disproportionate evictions in North Minneapolis using tax records, rental license data, and 100 landlord and tenant interviews. This amazing team, led by Dr. Brittany Lewis at the Center for Urban and Regional Affairs, has worked with a youth participatory action research team, testified at state legislative hearings, advised on a Minnesota state Supreme Court eviction case, and frequently presents research updates to an Evictions Advisory Council.

item.title: Who owns land in Hennepin county? A quantitative approach
item.description: I am currently working on a research project about larger shifts in ownership and land value that should be changing the way we understand who owns Hennepin County for Ed Goetz at the Center for Urban and Regional affairs.

item.title: Item with image
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: Item with image
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: Name of the work 1
item.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life. One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
